version_description: Supports Mavic Mini.

What's New

*Adds support for Russian and Italian languages.
*Adds new Report an Issue function to Customer Service.
*Fixes issue related to the Return to Home altitude being reset to 15 m after restarting the app or the aircraft.
*Fixes issue related to users incorrectly receiving an invalid email address error message.

What's New

Adds function for unlocking GEO Zones

What’s New

-Fixes crashing issues and improves app stability.

What’s New

-Optimizes warning prompts for when the aircraft is flying in strong winds.

-Fixes crashing issues and improves app stability.

What’s New

- Supports DJI’s latest drone: Mavic Air 2.

- Adds a new FocusTrack function: Select a target in Camera View and the camera will automatically lock onto it. Users can also set the aircraft to follow or circle a target (only available for Mavic Air 2).

- Adds a new Hyperlapse function: Includes a lower shooting threshold for creating stunning videos with ease (only available for Mavic Air 2).

- Adds support for iPad.

What’s New

-Fixes crashing issues and improves app stability.

What’s New

-Fixes crashing issues and improves app stability.

What’s New

-Fixes crashing issues and improves app stability.

What’s New

- Updates icons for the remote controller signal and GPS signal.

- Adds Target Scanning toggle in Control settings. When enabled, aircraft will automatically scan and display targets in the Camera View (only compatible with Mavic Air 2).

- Free Hyperlapse mode now supports the Spotlight function. After users drag a box to select a target, the target automatically stays centered in the shot (only compatible with Mavic Air 2).

- Fixes crashing issues and improves app stability.

What’s New

- Updates the display logic for battery and flight time alerts.

- Adds Advanced Gimbal Settings (for Mavic Air 2).

- Fixes app crashing issues and improves overall stability.

What’s New

- Adds a display for remaining storage space in Camera View.

- Fixes app crashing issues and improves overall stability.

What’s New

- Adds a display for remaining storage space in Camera View.

- Fixes app crashing issues and improves overall stability.

What’s New

- Fixes app crashing issues and improves overall stability.

What’s New?

Supports DJI’s new small aerial photography drone — DJI Mini 2.
- Adds a new QuickTransfer function. Connect your phone directly to the aircraft via Wi-Fi and transfer files from the aircraft to the phone’s album at speeds of up to 20 MB/s without using a remote controller.
- Adds a new Enhanced Photo function. The app automatically enhances the image quality of photos when they are downloaded, resulting in brighter colors and more vivid details.
- Adds a new Trimmed Download function. Trim a desired clip from a video file and download it to your phone, saving time and storage space.
(The above functions are compatible with DJI Mini 2)
Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.

Notice: Starting from V1.2.0, DJI Fly will be compatible with iOS 14. For iOS users, we recommend updating your current iOS version to iOS 11 or later to be compatible with DJI Fly V1.2.0 or later versions. For users who require to continue using iOS 10 or earlier versions, you can download DJI Fly V1.1.10 from the DJI official website, but you will be unable to perform updates for subsequent versions.

What’s New?

- Fixed issue: "Weak signal. Adjust antennas" pop-up message did not disappear automatically when using Mavic Mini.

- Fixes some issues and optimizes overall app quality.

What’s New?

- Adds a new Attitude Indicator: Learn more about your aircraft’s orientation and flight info.
- Adds Flight Tips: View interesting aerial photography tips during scenarios such as firmware updates, taking hyperlapse shots, and when the aircraft is returning to home.
- Adds the following supported functions for the Customizable Button on remote controller: Gimbal Follow/FPV, Camera Settings, and Exposure Lock/Unlock.
- Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.

For iOS Users
What’s New
- DJI Fly now remembers screen orientation when launching DJI Fly using the same aircraft model with Portrait Orientation Lock enabled.
- Adds Device Management under Profile to allow you to learn more about your DJI devices and check their usage data.
- Fixes certain issues and improves overall app stability and user experience.
- Fixes certain issues and improves overall app stability and user experience.

- Supports DJI FPV.
- Fixes certain issues and improves overall app stability and user experience.
- Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.

What's New

- Supports DJI Air 2S
- Adds a new MasterShots feature for taking pro-level video recordings. (Currently only compatible with DJI Air 2S)
- Supports adding new Fly Spots, uploading photos, and adding comments to Fly Spots

What's New

- Adds Connection Guide for DJI FPV to check how to connect to DJI FPV combo.

- Adds Color Display Assist when using D-log to check color effects directly in Camera View (Available with DJI Air 2S).

- Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.

What's New

- Adds Connection Guide for DJI FPV to check how to connect to DJI FPV combo.

- Adds Color Display Assist when using D-log to check color effects directly in Camera View (Available with DJI Air 2S).

- Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.

What's New

- Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app quality.

What's New

- Adds support for DJI Mini SE.

- Adds Trimmed Download for DJI Air 2S.

- Optimizes camera exposure parameter adjustment.

- Optimizes attitude indicator and map on bottom-left of the screen.
